scripts.text: The people are watching a presentation.
Some books are being placed on a cart.
The people are kneeling in front of a shelf.
scripts.translation: 사람들이 선반 앞에 무릎을 꿇고 있다.

scripts.text: The people are visiting a library.
The women are facing each other.
The women are walking together.
One of the women is removing an item from her purse.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 핸드백에서 물건을 꺼내고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is drinking from a coffee cup.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 커피잔으로 마시고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the men is emptying out a plastic bag.
scripts.translation: 남자들 중 한 명이 비닐봉투를 비우고 있다.

scripts.text: They're waiting in line at a checkout counter.
scripts.translation: 사람들이 계산대에서 줄을 서서 기다리고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the men is pointing at some flowers.
scripts.translation: 남자들 중 한 명이 꽃들을 가리키고 있다.

scripts.text: They're selecting some fruits and vegetables.
Some plants have been arranged in a row.
The woman is leaning against a windowsill.
Some cabinets have been opened at a workstation.
The woman is reading a billboard.
A house overlooks a fishing pier.
Ducks are swimming in a lake.
A bridge crosses over a river.
Some trees border a pond.
One of the women is picking up a suitcase.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 여행 가방을 들고 있다.

scripts.text: Her arm.
One of the women is holding a notebook under her arm.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 팔에 책을 끼고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is standing in the doorway.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 문틀에 서 있다.
